LOL you show all your plans

From: Sandy Panico 
Sent: Thursday, August 11,=
 2011 8:41 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: OOC: Time Jump




G=
otchya.  Consider the reserves he had are sparse but willing to share them
=


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Aug 11, 2011, at 9:02 P=
M, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:


    
  Okay,

  I have=
 thought about the subspace pocket thing. What I am going to do
  is this. =
Go ahead and do what you will with the provisions you are
  having Tuscon h=
and out now.

  BUT!

  From this point foward, unless your character's fun=
ction involves
  transport, and when I say function, I mean the part of you=
r bio that
  lists function, then your subspace pocket is just that - a poc=
ket. It
  is basically the size of a transformer sized gym bag. You can car=
ry
  your weapons, maybe a padd or two, A book and a few small odds and
  e=
nds. But things should be related to your actual function in one way
  or a=
nother. IE: A medic could pull out medical supplies, a mechanic
  would hav=
e tools, a thief would have lock picks ect. However a thief
  should not be=
 pulling out specialized mechanics tools that used to
  belong to wheeljack=
 2 centuries that he preserved for just such an
  occasion, unless it has b=
een stated in advance.

  The sub space pocket is NOT suppose to be this hu=
ge area that you can
  carry everything, and like a ladies big tote bag tha=
t carries
  everything but the kitchen sink :)

  What this does is it keep=
 the characters interacting. The characters
  are suppose to need each othe=
r and depend on each other. or at least
  RP together to get what they need=
. And it is unfair that one character
  can pull from subspace whatever is =
needed withou ever stating they
  packed it there and having no reason for =
it being there except that
  they need it now. It short circuits the play.
=

  To use an example if you have a sniper running for his life and he all
 =
 of a sudden starts pulling out grenades and bombs and such, then what
  is=
 the use for the person who's function is bomber? And why would a
  sniper =
have such things, since his fuction involves long ranged
  attacks? Now if =
the character were to state, and I pick up a few
  grenades just in case, t=
hen it would make sens.

  Does this make sense, can you see what I am aimi=
ng at?

  So again, please feel free to hand out supplies as you need, this=
 is
  what i am going with from this point foward.

  I hope I make sense, =
cause I am typing this out fast so I can get some diner.

  TTYL

  - Prest=
on

  On 8/11/11, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
  > Actually,=
 Tucson is distributing an emergency supply for now but they will
  > need =
more. By the way, Straight Shot is finding a new friend among the
  > enemy=
. Waspinator is the only bot comparable to her size, since she is a
  > bit=
 smaller than him. Sort of like Silverbolt and Black Arachnia. They
  > bec=
ame lovers. This time, Straight Shot is finding out that Waspinator is a
  =
> great bot to talk to. She hopes to keep the friendship a secret from
  > =
Rodimus and Leo but they may find out eventually. Which makes for a nice
  =
> side story.
